verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:4
verses.text: And Saul gathered the people together, and numbered them in Telaim, two hundred thousand footmen, and ten thousand men of Judah.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:5
verses.text: And Saul came to a city of Amalek, and laid wait in the valley.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:6
verses.text: And Saul said unto the Kenites, Go, depart, get you down from among the Amalekites, lest I destroy you with them: for ye shewed kindness to all the children of Israel, when they came up out of Egypt. So the Kenites departed from among the Amalekites.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:7
verses.text: And Saul smote the Amalekites from Havilah until thou comest to Shur, that is over against Egypt.
